GLIM: GOLD [Severity of COPD according to the GOLD classification]
handgrip strenght (mean value for two hands)
low handgrip strenght <27 kg for men and <16 kg for women
Low muscle mass (ALM index <=7.40 for men and <=5.6 for women; polish cut-off points)
phenotypic criteria [presence of any phenotypic criteria (GLIM )]
weak legs- Chair Stand Test >15 seconds
